alert.note: Alert for Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 21 at 3:38AM MDT until July 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Gusty Winds...and Scattered Dry Thunderstorms may create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY Fire Zone....280. In North Central WY Fire Zone....281. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Natrona. In North Central WY...Johnson. * WIND: West 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. Brief higher gusts of 40 to 50 mph are possible in thunderstorm outflows Friday afternoon and evening. * HUMIDITY: 8 to 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the mid 90s.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM
